data.name: Quester
data.detailed_description:
In Quester, you play as a brave adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes, all while keeping your energy-- AKA "POWER" charged up. Collect magic trinkets, learn powerful abilities, and forge your own path through the world of Quester; A roguelike inspired by classic arcade games of yore. Travel through several varied zones teeming with hostile enemies. Do you dare venture into the dark crypt and face the evil that dwells within?



Fast Paced
Once you start moving, you can't stop. You'll have to stay on your toes and make decisions quick or it might just be game over!

Frantic Battles
When you attack, your POWER meter depletes. Let it get too low and you won't be able to attack anymore. Balance battling with collecting coins to replenish your meter and stay in the fight!

Strong Adventurers
As you venture farther into a run, your hero will level up, granting you choices on a new abilities. With 9 different playable or unlockable characters-- all with their own unique pool of abilities-- there's numerous playstyles and synergies you can try out!

Always Fresh
Levels are procedurally generated, with each area having its own unique generation style. Travel through several varied zones, from friendly forests full of slimes and goblins to eerie crypts teeming with the long-forgotten undead.

data.short_description: Assume control of a courageous adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes. Dance with death as you balance fighting with scavenging for loot and power in this classic-arcade inspired roguelike.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/a
